intro: Calathea barbata, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a tropical flowering plant native to South America. It is characterized by its striking, variegated leaves that feature a zigzag pattern of light and dark green. The plant belongs to the Marantaceae family and is known for its ability to thrive in low-light conditions. Its leaves are often adorned with intricate patterns and can change color in response to light exposure. Calathea barbata is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
